Articles.Content:
The folks down in financial proposed a new and radical advertising campaign. Needless to say Jeb took a liking to it and has a new hobby while the grease monkeys are assembling his next mission to Eeloo. Left, Jeb, Left

![rrCYeha.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/rrCYeha.jpg)

Heh. Funny thing is there are lots of smaller teams that will gladly sell you full-wrap "sponsor" ad space on their cars one race at a time. The company I work for had a car for three races a couple years back. Strange feeling to see a 3D version of your business card spinning around in an endless loop.... didn't make the race any more interesting though.

Potentially relevant:

![IJB6U8h.png](http://i.imgur.com/IJB6U8h.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-31T21:14:48Z" title="05/31/2015 09:14  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 31, 2015</time> by NovaSilisko**

> 
> Relevant:
> [http://i.imgur.com/IJB6U8h.png](http://i.imgur.com/IJB6U8h.png)

It would be pretty neat if that were a supply ship bringing pizza to the ISS.

> 
> It would be pretty neat if that were a supply ship bringing pizza to the ISS.

That did happen, once. Just not on that launch, that was the Zvezda ISS module.

If KSP gets to the point that they can afford ads on real rockets...

*(shudder)*

> 
> If KSP gets to the point that they can afford ads on real rockets...
> *(shudder)*

Dunno. Ads on a rocket have got to be way cheaper than the total cost of said rocket. Any ideas as to what Pizza the Hutt paid for that spot?

> 
> Dunno. Ads on a rocket have got to be way cheaper than the total cost of said rocket. **Any ideas as to what Pizza the Hutt paid for that spot?**

I'd say 1,000,000 spacebucks.

> 
> Dunno. Ads on a rocket have got to be way cheaper than the total cost of said rocket. Any ideas as to what Pizza the Hutt paid for that spot?

At least 40.

saucer looking hat delivered to space by a human rocket ?!? ; )

> ![Only_the_serious_know_how_to_truly_laugh.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/8/86/Only_the_serious_know_how_to_truly_laugh.jpg)

> 
> Potentially relevant:
> [http://i.imgur.com/IJB6U8h.png](http://i.imgur.com/IJB6U8h.png)

most expensive pizza delivery ever.

i hope the iss crew likes anchovies.

> 
> most expensive pizza delivery ever.
> i hope the iss crew likes anchovies.

"Who ordered that pineapple!?"
